title: Privacy Policy

collection.title: 1. Information Collection
collection.intro: We collect the following types of information:
collection.account: Account Information: When you log in through GitHub or Google, we collect your basic account information, including username, email address, and avatar
collection.usage: Usage Data: We collect information about how you use our services, including projects, tasks you create, and usage patterns
collection.technical: Technical Information: We automatically collect certain technical information, such as IP address, browser type, device information, and access times

usage.title: 2. Information Use
usage.intro: We use the collected information to:
items: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
Analyze service usage to improve user experience
Detect, prevent, and resolve technical issues

sharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
sharing.intro: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties, except:
items: To comply with legal requirements or court orders
To protect our rights, property, or safety

security.title: 4. Data Security
security.intro: We take appropriate security measures to protect your personal information:
items: Use encryption technology to protect data transmission

cookies.title: 5. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.intro: We use cookies and similar technologies to:
cookies.control: You can control the use of cookies through your browser settings.

thirdParty.title: 6. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: Our service may contain links to third-party websites or integrate third-party services (such as GitHub, Google). These third parties have their own privacy policies, and we are not responsible for their privacy practices.

retention.title: 7. Data Retention
retention.intro: We will retain your personal information until:
items: We no longer need to provide services to you
Legal requirements require us to delete
retention.backup: Even after deletion, some information may remain in our backup systems for a period of time.

rights.title: 8. Your Rights
items: Access personal information we hold about you
Restrict or object to processing of your personal information

children.title: 9. Children's Privacy
children.content: Our service is not directed to children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we discover that we have collected such information, we will delete it immediately.

changes.title: 10. Policy Changes
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. For significant changes, we will notify you through the service or send an email. Continued use of the service indicates your acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: 11. Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy policy, please contact us:

footer: We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring that your personal information is handled securely.
